item.description:
chakkilam venkaTesh’s many lies about vaikhAnasa-s (also pAncharAtra, vishiShTAdvaita, rAmAnuja)

Source: TW

विस्तारः (द्रष्टुं नोद्यम्)

Thanks to vaikhAnasa scholars

  • Prof ViShNu bhaTTAchAryulu for his work Agama-vimarshaH, and
  • Matapalli brahmAchAryulu for sending me utpatty-asambhavAdhikaraNa of shrInivAsa-makhin’s bhAShya

Topics -

00:00 - Intro 00:55 - Chakkilam venkaTesh’s lies 04:50 - Prof ViShNu bhaTTAchAryulu of CSU Tiurpati, Agama advisor to TTD temple 05:59 - Chakkilam venkaTesh’s lies - recap 06:40 - Sources used 08:44 - viShNu-supremacy in vaikhAnasa darshana (refers to Agama-vimarsha by viShNu-bhaTTa, dasha-vidha-hetu-nirUpaNa by shrInivAsa makhI) 12:04 - Meaning of “nirguNa” in vaikhAnasa doctrine differs from shAnkara imagination (uttama-brahma-vidyA-sAra of sundararAja, vaikhAnasa-vijaya, shrInivAsa-yajvan’s bhAShya on pAramAtmikopaniShat, nRsiMha-vAjapeyi on vaikhAnasa dharmasUtra, shrInivAsa makhI’s gRhya-sUtra commentary) 24:35 - chAtur-vyUha concept in dasha-vidha-hetu-nirUpaNa by shrInivAsa makhI 28:00 - jIvan-mukti not moxa as per vaikhAnasa-s. Endorsement of vaikuNTha and 3 other loka-s. (refers to Agama-vimarsha by viShNu-bhaTTa, brahma-sUtra-shrI-vishiShTAdvaita-bhAShya by shrInivAsa-makhI) 31:30 - vishiShTAdvaita is the philosophy of vaikhAnasa-s. 33:55 - Chakkilam venkaTesh’s lies about rAmAnuja, vishiShTAdvaita, pAncharAtra. 35:55 - vaikhAnasa-brahma-sUtra-bhAShya’s utpatty-asambhavAdhikaraNa defends pAncharAtra and 4-vyUha conception. 39:15 - vaikhAnasa’s greatness beyond pAncharAtra 40:15 - Conclusion, and a question - Is Chakkilam Venkatesh, who lies and fakes so much, qualified to call himself vedAntAchArya and teach 6-darshanas?
